infoessence.settings.checkMmoIdFirst.des: If the parser should check for MMOItem id first.
infoessence.settings.displayInName.descr: Whether to display overall percentage in item name.
infoessence.settings.displayInLore.descr: Whether to display individual percentage in lore.
infoessence.settings.refineMultiplier.de: The stat multiplier of each refine.
infoessence.settings.statRegex.descripti: The regex for each stats. Required named groups: name, value.
infoessence.settings.mmoMap.description: The MMO id map to fetch more accurate value, with a multiplier.
infoessence.settings.rangeTable.descript: The table for ranges, structured as Map<"mmoItemType:mmoItemId", Map<attrName, Range(double, double)>>, this has higher priority than rangeRegex.
infoessence.settings.rangeRegex.descript: The regex for stat ranges. Required named groups: name, min, max.
infoessence.settings.nameCorrections.des: A name table for naming mistakes (range name -> stat name).
infoessence.settings.displayInLoreWhenSi: Whether to display in the lore if there's only 1 possible attribute.
infoessence.settings.rarities.descriptio: List of rarities that sorts from low to high.
infoessence.settings.idDisplayPosition.d: The position of the MMOITEMS_ITEM_ID display in lore.
infoessence.settings.externalEditorRecom: It's recommended to use Ctrl+A, Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V and an external text editor to edit this field.
